channel.title: Very short intro to:
channel.description: “The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.” ― Terry Pratchett

item.title: chrome screenshots
item.description: There was a time when I didnt know how to do this. That time has passed.open dev toolstype in Firefox screenshots though 🔥
item.content:encoded:
There was a time when I didnt know how to do this. That time has passed.

  • open dev tools
  • cmd-shift-p
  • type in capture full size screenshot

Firefox screenshots though 🔥

item.title: Very Short Intro
item.description: This is my first post on my new fake blog. 🇨🇦I dont even know what a blog is. I’m posting here to help me solidify some ideas. If you…
item.content:encoded:
This is my first post on my new fake blog. 🇨🇦

I dont even know what a blog is. I’m posting here to help me solidify some ideas. If you think you can help. Please do so.

Should be interesting in the future.

Here’s a great quote from this Wikipedia on Solar irradiance.

The study and measurement of solar irradiance have several important applications, including the prediction of energy generation from solar power plants, the heating and cooling loads of buildings, and in climate modeling and weather forecasting.
